name: geological-context
title: GeologicalContext
description: A set of geological designations, such as stratigraphy, that qualifies a dwc:Event.

fields.name: geologicalContextID
fields.title: Geological Context ID
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.

fields.name: eventID
fields.title: Event ID
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.

fields.name: earliestEonOrLowestEonothem
fields.title: Earliest Eon Or Lowest Eonothem
fields.description: A full name of a earliest possible geochronologic eon or lowest chrono-stratigraphic eonothem or the informal name ('Precambrian') attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which a dwc:MaterialEntity was collected.

fields.name: latestEonOrHighestEonothem
fields.title: Latest Eon Or Highest Eonothem
fields.description: A full name of a latest possible geochronologic eon or highest chrono-stratigraphic eonothem or the informal name ('Precambrian') attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which a dwc:MaterialEntity was collected.

fields.name: earliestEraOrLowestErathem
fields.title: Earliest Era Or Lowest Erathem
fields.description: A full name of a earliest possible geochronologic era or lowest chronostratigraphic erathem attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which a dwc:MaterialEntity was collected.

fields.name: latestEraOrHighestErathem
fields.title: Latest Era Or Highest Erathem
fields.description: A full name of a latest possible geochronologic era or highest chronostratigraphic erathem attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which a dwc:MaterialEntity was collected.

fields.name: earliestPeriodOrLowestSystem
fields.title: Earliest Period Or Lowest System
fields.description: A full name of a earliest possible geochronologic period or lowest chronostratigraphic system attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which a dwc:MaterialEntity was collected.

fields.name: latestPeriodOrHighestSystem
fields.title: Latest Period Or Highest System
fields.description: A full name of a latest possible geochronologic period or highest chronostratigraphic system attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which a dwc:MaterialEntity was collected.

fields.name: earliestEpochOrLowestSeries
fields.title: Earliest Epoch Or Lowest Series
fields.description: A full name of a earliest possible geochronologic epoch or lowest chronostratigraphic series attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which a dwc:MaterialEntity was collected.

fields.name: latestEpochOrHighestSeries
fields.title: Latest Epoch Or Highest Series
fields.description: A full name of a latest possible geochronologic epoch or highest chronostratigraphic series attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which a dwc:MaterialEntity was collected.

fields.name: earliestAgeOrLowestStage
fields.title: Earliest Age Or Lowest Stage
fields.description: A full name of a earliest possible geochronologic age or lowest chronostratigraphic stage attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which a dwc:MaterialEntity was collected.

fields.name: latestAgeOrHighestStage
fields.title: Latest Age Or Highest Stage
fields.description: A full name of a latest possible geochronologic age or highest chronostratigraphic stage attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which a dwc:MaterialEntity was collected.

fields.name: lowestBiostratigraphicZone
fields.title: Lowest Biostratigraphic Zone
fields.description: A full name of a lowest possible geological biostratigraphic zone of the stratigraphic horizon from which a dwc:MaterialEntity was collected.

fields.name: highestBiostratigraphicZone
fields.title: Highest Biostratigraphic Zone
fields.description: A full name of a highest possible geological biostratigraphic zone of the stratigraphic horizon from which a dwc:MaterialEntity was collected.

fields.name: lithostratigraphicTerms
fields.title: Lithostratigraphic Terms
fields.description: A combination of all litho-stratigraphic names for a rock from which a dwc:MaterialEntity was collected.

fields.name: group
fields.title: Group
fields.description: A full name of a lithostratigraphic group from which a dwc:MaterialEntity was collected.

fields.name: formation
fields.title: Formation
fields.description: A full name of a lithostratigraphic formation from which a dwc:MaterialEntity was collected.

fields.name: member
fields.title: Member
fields.description: A full name of a lithostratigraphic member from which a dwc:MaterialEntity was collected.

fields.name: bed
fields.title: Bed
fields.description: A full name of a lithostratigraphic bed from which a dwc:MaterialEntity was collected.
